citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:25 AM on
17JULY2025. The inspector was able to contact the licensee by phone, however the licensee was out of town delivering
puppies at the time of attempted inspection and was not available for inspection.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a violation of the AWA and regulations.
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:25 AM on 
17JULY2025. The inspector was able to contact the licensee by phone, however the licensee was out of town delivering 
puppies at the time of attempted inspection and was not available for inspection. 
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a violation of the AWA and regulations. 
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
